guitar.name: Les Paul
guitar.creator: Gibson
guitar.description: Populariziran od strane Jimmy Pagea, ovaj model je čest u rock žanru.

guitar.name: SG
guitar.creator: Gibson
guitar.description: Korišten od strane Angusa Younga iz AC/DC, poznat po rocku i hard rocku.

guitar.name: Stratocaster
guitar.creator: Fender
guitar.description: Omiljen od strane Jimi Hendrixa, često korišten u bluesu i rocku.

guitar.name: Telecaster
guitar.creator: Fender
guitar.description: Omiljen od strane Bruce Springsteena, popularan u country i rocku.

guitar.name: Flying V
guitar.creator: Gibson
guitar.description: Korišten od strane Albert Kinga, čest u bluesu i heavy metalu.

guitar.name: Explorer
guitar.creator: Gibson
guitar.description: Korišten od strane James Hetfielda iz Metallice, popularan u heavy metalu.
